messages.text:
Fahad ! Direct 5 Star Office Jao.Wahab sy Page ka Poucho/Report krky Block & Daily Payment krwao.Sallaries & Pending payments release krni hai.Waqas ky NEW PORTAL per Calls & Sirf Payment ke baat kro.payments Krwao.Sab ko  Relocate ka inform kro & Daily payments krwao. without payment Aap ka Regular ZERO DAy  hy.

Aaj Sallaries Pay krni hai,Battery waly Kanjer sy Cash ya Cash Cheque Lo & KAL SEO,Web Designer,Graphic Designer Hiring Campaign sy applicants sy interviews per aany walo ke Danyal sy update lylo.as per poicy pahly interview mei sab clear krny ky baad sirf selected applicants ko same day nahi different dates per for trial bulao.

&

Campaigns ko khud check kro & Danyal sy100 Leads per day ky plan ky msg sy Target poora kro & Daily Haafiz/Haadi ky msg nahi kro,Ye Aap ka Kaam hy Jaisy bhi krna hy krky do.Urgent Chat Gpt ke File sy Whatsapp APi Ka Oracle software mei procedure study krky Azeem ka System Hack & Wati waly Whatsapp Api sy Clients ko Payment ky msg send kro.templaet already approved hy.

Talha & Danyal sy Saturday tak ke Waqas/Hiba Files proper check krwao & Each/Every Campaign ky Total Prints/CVS Campaign wise Files mei with index set & Hiba sy Daily Visitors ke File update krky send & bolo Aapni/Waqas ke Working check krwao.

&

Ye Clear & Final Warning msg hy.Aapny Manjan/Chorran Mughy nahi do na Free Trial options per Work nahi kro,Phr Same Working repeat & Time waste hoga.Dashboard kylye Website/Web hosting & Landing Pages use kro.strictly & only as per my Msgs/Model per Work & Work Load divide krky coding/backend,UI/UX work mei Shahazib,Umaimma,Amaan & Summaya sy most/urgent work pahly ye final krwao.

Aab ye single Developer Job nahi hy & Haafiz ky Ser Baitho,Pahly Master Agent mei mery msg ky mutabiq errors Fix & perfect kro.Perfect MASTER Agent ko Umamma ky saath AI Agents colone/Ready kro on sdk based.Whatsapp # Internal Office communication Ai Project ky jo bhi issues hai solve krwao.

&

Life time Project nahi hy.Strictly Mery Aaj ky/Orevious Msgs & Model ko Fillow kro,Koi bhi Staff Aapna new Model ya Feature ya Testing/Falto Tools use nahi kryga.Aap ke supervision lund & already behind schedule hy.single developer mode mei Working nahi hoga,Mughy Urgent Sab staff sy communicate & Daily Working msg send krny hain.Aap,Haafiz & Haadi Head Office/5 Star ky Staff ky 5 msgs test krlo.jo bhi issue/Errorrs hai Current Models mei Fix krky do.

kerlya mei issue hy tu AI CALL CENTRE REVELIANCE AI CHAT GPT ke File study kro,10 other services ke details hai.not eleven labs.Current AI Call Centre mostly ready made & limited 50-100 Calls per day ka IP Telephonic communication setup hy,cosider it like PTCL ON IP & Sab ko guide krdo.

ORIGNAL AI CALL CENTRE REVILIANCE AI PER BASED & FOR UPTO 1,000 USERS PER DAY HY.SATURDAY SY AI REBELIANCE CALL CENTRE PER WORKING START KRO.

Haafiz sy ZOHO SY SALES LEADS PER WORK NAHI KRwao PAHLY INTERNAL OFFICE COMMUNICATION PROJECT,ORACLE SOFTWARE HACK KRKY WATI WHATSAPP API SET & IP PHONE SET UP FINAL Kro.

*samjha gaya bahi and guide krdunga-*

Haafiz sy ZOHO SY SALES LEADS PER WORK NAHI KRwao PAHLY INTERNAL OFFICE COMMUNICATION PROJECT,ORACLE SOFTWARE HACK KRKY WATI WHATSAPP API SET & IP PHONE SET UP FINAL Kro.

Fahad ! Direct 5 Star Office Jao.Shazaib sy Cloud per uploading ke Working Final krwao & Daily ONLINE Payments Receipts ke Jpeg Files Aapny ya Office ky Whatsapp per Lo/same day Resize krky Same day uptodate Receipts pdf mei convert / compress krky QR per upload krwado.

Shazaib/Amaan sy,IT MULTIVERSE & IT INDUS WEBSITES mei Zoho ky seprate page mei Zoho Services ky Sepeate pages Create krky Html sy Link krwao & Zoho Services ky New Pages mei content/Pics & Videos bhi add krwao.

&

ORIGNAL AI CALL CENTRE REVILIANCE AI PER BASED & FOR UPTO 1,000 USERS PER DAY HY.SATURDAY SY AI REBELIANCE CALL CENTRE PER Khud WORKING START KRO.

&


Aapni Calling sy 01 September till 10 September tak Clients sy Payment ke Weekly Report & Aapni Calling sy 01 August till 31 August tak ke As per Ledjor & Schedule,Total Clients sy Aapni Payment ke seprate Combine Report Send kro.

Check Your Whatsapp inbox Aap ko Last Werk All Previous Camapigns ke Lists send krde hai.Bilqis,Asim ky & New Staff Aazam ko Daily Previous Sales/Marketing & Hiring Campaigns dain & Sab ko bolain Pahly Sales/Marketing Campaigns sy Clients ko Calls & Daily 25 per day ke Sales Calls Krain & Clients ko unky Budget ky Mutabiq,Pak Towers,URBAN TOWN,Mehak & Sukkur ke Sales Offer dain.Sales Campaigns per Calls/Sales ke Daily 25 Calls per dsy ke Sales Calling Sheet send krain.Aapni Calling Sheet sy intrested Clients ko Regular Followup krain & Raheel sy meeting krwein.

&

Muskan,Shanaz,Bilqis,Asim & New Staff Azam Different September Recovery PORTALS sy Clients sy Recovery Calls krwao.As per Ledjor & Schedule Payment krwain.Recovery/remainder Calls & Daily Compulsory 25 Calls with seprate Comments ke Recovery Calling sheet send krain.

FOLLOW RECOVERY CALLING INSTRUCTIONS.Mobile Off,Multiple Plots waly Same Client ky same Comments in different Plots ya Client sy Baat Nahi ho tu Calling Sheet mei Count nahi krain na Likhain & Daily MSG Krain,Aaj Aap ky Portal sy Kis Client ny Payment ke hy ya Nahi?

NOTE :

TOTAL 14 WEBSITES & Social Media ky Local/Overseas  Page ke Danyal sy Lists lylo.Amaan ky Msg/Proposal ky Mutabiq Optin Set krwao & Daikho.Danyal ke Daily SEO Working sy Websites Social Media Pages per bhi koi optin nahi aa raha hy,check krky urgent errors fix kro & at least Daily 1 Company ke Website & Company/ PROJECTS ky different Social Media Pages ky Logos/Contact us BUTTONS & OFFICE PTCL,Mobile,Whatsapp,Email Logos per Client ky Click per automatic OPTIN/CONSENT ke Daily List send kro.

Shazaib and Umama has wrongly implemented opt-in functionality in all sites & Danyal ke Report ky mutabiq Daily websites & Soicial Media pages per Visitors/Followers aa rahy hai.2 Month mei 20 Campaigns bhi Run ke hai,Aab Website ky Landing pages sy campaigns Run ho rahe hai & Daily Social Media pages per activity sy traffic bhi hy.

Fahad ! Direct 5 Star Office Jao.Shazaib sy Cloud per uploading ke Working Final krwao & Daily ONLINE Payments Receipts ke Jpeg Files Aapny ya Office ky Whatsapp per Lo/same day Resize krky Same day uptodate Receipts pdf mei convert / compress krky QR per upload krwado.
